item.title: WWE 2K25: Who Should You Choose in The Tribal Gauntlet?
item.description:
As players make their way through the storied history of the Samoan Dynasty in WWE 2K25 , there will come a time where the game's Showcase mode comes to an epic conclusion in the form of a Gauntlet Match. It is at this point in time that players need to decide who they consider to be the true Tribal Chief of the Bloodline, whether its a past, present, or upcoming talent in the family.

After players complete the previous matches, including the notoriously tedious Money in the Bank match with Tamina, they will have a decision to make as to who should rule the tribe. For those wondering who should be chosen as the Tribal Chief in WWE 2K25 's Showcase Mode , this guide will provide some recommendations.

How To Enter The Tribal Gauntlet

The Tribal Gauntlet is the final match of WWE 2K25 's Showcase mode, and gives players the freedom to decide who should be the Tribal Chief. To enter, you must first complete all previous Showcase Matches , from Yokozuna's powerful display against Hulk Hogan, through to The Islander's victory over the Street Profits. Once you have completed all previous challenges, the final battle will be made available.

Once the Tribal Gauntlet has been unlocked, a page with 24 of the personalities you played as throughout the Showcase will be available. It is up to you to decide which one you will control as you head into a 10-person Gauntlet Match.

Who Should You Choose For The Tribal Gauntlet?

Players who are looking to run through the gauntlet without too much trouble can opt for the most obvious choices for Tribal Chief in Roman Reigns or The Rock , both of whom have a rating of 95 or better. In saying that, the rewards for completing the Gauntlet Match do not differ according to who you pick, so it is more a matter of preference . In saying that, there are a few other recommendations, depending on which Bloodline member you feel has the greatest claim to the throne. Some suggestions are as follows:

  • If you want to support the person who started the entire dynasty, then you should choose "High Chief" Peter Maivia.
  • If you want to support the first person in the family to win a world championship, you should choose Yokozuna.
  • If you wish to usher in a new era for the Bloodline, Jacob Fatu has the character and skillset to carry the mantle.
  • To pay homage to the impactful women in the Bloodline, then Nia Jax has the potential to dominate the guantlet.

From a technical perspective, you may want to take into account the skillsets and abilities of the superstars at your disposal. You will want to absorb as little damage as possible and use as little stamina as you can to last to the end, so you may want to opt for a Striker or Technician over a Giant, as their moveset is faster and enables them to beat their opponent to the punch. Of course, for a greater challenge, you can go for one of the lower-rated wrestlers to increase the match difficulty.

All Tribal Guantlet Participant Ratings

As mentioned above, one consideration you may like to make when deciding on who will be your Tribal Chief is the overall skill level of the wrestler. Below are the ratings for each eligible participant, along with their fighting style, which dictates their move set.

All Showcase Match 17 Rewards

Unlike the other matches in WWE 2K25 's Showcase Mode, player's won't have a list of objectives to complete. Instead, you'll be required to defeat 9 opponents in a row in a Gauntlet Match, all of whom were playable characters throughout the Showcase. Upon defeating the final combatant, you can declare your wrestler the Tribal Chief of the iconic Bloodline Dynasty.

Once you run through the gauntlet of Samoan stars, players will earn the following rewards:

  • The Tribal Hall of Acknowledgement (Arena)
  • Jimmy Uso '10 (Superstar)
  • Jey Uso '10 (Superstar)
  • Tamina '10 (Superstar)

item.title: Monopoly GO Tycoon Club: How to Create a Shareable Card
item.description:
Scopely just keeps making Monopoly GO better by adding a ton of new features occasionally. As of the recent update, they’ve added the option to create a shareable card in the Tycoon Club that highlights specific stickers. Shareable cards make it easy to find and trade needed stickers. This way, players can quickly identify and exchange stickers to complete their sticker albums. Read on to learn how you can create your own shareable card and streamline your sticker trading in Monopoly GO .

How To Create A Shareable Card in Monopoly GO

Creating a shareable card is a great way to boost your sticker trading in Monopoly GO . The process is pretty simple. Here’s how you can create yours:

  1. Open the Monopoly GO app and access the Tycoon Club. To access Tycoon Club on an Android device, you need to visit the official Monopoly GO website.
  2. In the Tycoon Club, open the main menu by clicking on the three horizontal bars in the top right corner.
  3. Next, look for the “Album” tab within the Tycoon Club’s menu. Here, you’ll see a section for Sticker Cards and another one for Album.
  4. In the Sticker Cards menu, you'll see two tabs: "Missing Stickers" and "Duplicate Stickers."
  5. Tap the "+" icons in the empty slots to add stickers to these sections.
  6. When you’re done, tap the "Share" button. This will give you options to share the card through social media platforms.
  • Select "Missing Stickers" to create a card showing the stickers you need.
  • Select "Duplicate Stickers" to create a card showing the stickers you have extra of and are willing to trade.

How To Use A Shareable Card in Monopoly GO

Monopoly GO ’s Shareable Sticker Cards are designed to make sticker trading easier and help you complete your albums faster. To make the most of this feature, you should select your stickers strategically:

  • In the missing stickers section, prioritize the stickers you need most to complete sets with valuable rewards.
  • In the duplicate stickers section, choose duplicates from popular sets or those you think other players might need.

Share your card with your Monopoly GO friends, in communities and groups, where you can reach active players who are more likely to trade. As you get new stickers or complete trades, update your shareable card to reflect your latest needs and offers.

When selecting stickers, make sure they are from the correct sticker set. You can always edit your shareable card and add/remove a sticker by clicking on the pen icon at the top of the sticker.

item.title: Days Gone Broken Road DLC Can Now Be Wishlisted on Steam
item.description:
Summary

  • Bend Studio confirms the Days Gone Broken Road DLC is now available to wishlist on Steam for PC users.
  • Days Gone Remastered is set to launch for PlayStation 5 on April 25, 2025.
  • New features include DualSense controller support, enhanced photo mode, and Permadeath and Horde Assault modes.

Bend Studio has confirmed the Days Gone Broken Road DLC has now been made available to wishlist on Steam for PC users. Accompanying Days Gone Remastered , which is scheduled to launch on April 25, 2025, for PlayStation 5 owners, the Broken Days DLC is the PC equivalent to the PlayStation remaster, which offers several new features and upgrades to give this beloved post-apocalyptic title a makeover in 2025.

Days Gone was first released in 2019 on the PlayStation 4, and the action-adventure later received a PC port in 2021. Set in a decayed Oregon two years after a virus turned humans into zombies, or Freakers, drifter Deacon St. John travels the state to find his wife, who was previously presumed dead. Days Gone Remastered pre-orders gained a strong start, entering the top 10 of the PS Store, and sold alee to the controversial whirlwind surrounding fans’ ongoing pursuit for a sequel.

Announced in a blog post on Steam, Bend encouraged the gaming community to wishlist the Days Gone Broken Road DLC on the PC platform and outlined the new features to look forward to. Days Gone Remastered was announced back in February 2025, and the enhanced PlayStation 5 remaster and the PC DLC promise to deliver controller support for DualSense, enhanced photo mode, and a handful of new accessibility features, including High Contrast mode, and changes to game speed. Additionally, the DLC will add a new Horde Assault survival arcade mode, a Speedrun mode, and a Permadeath mode.

Days Gone Broken Days DLC Can Now Be Wishlisted on Steam

Days Gone fans were already unhappy with the remaster being digital only, but followers of the adventure game are also carping about the DLC’s lack of new content as they don’t think additional features like controller support or new modes should be marketed as such. Others disagree, saying new modes mean new content, and several fans admitted they were looking forward to trying the upcoming hardcore endeavor.

Days Gone Remastered is certainly paving the way for the forthcoming year of the undead in gaming, as there are several in-development zombie titles set to create a renaissance in 2025. In addition to Days Gone , Sony will also be releasing The Last of Us Part 2 Remastered's PC port in April, just in time for the HBO show’s season 2 debut, and Dying Light: The Beast and John Carpenter's Toxic Commando are also expected to receive 2025 release dates. Furthermore, State of Decay 3 is still in the pipeline, alongside a rumored Back 4 Blood sequel.

item.title: Monopoly GO: How to Get Scottie Awards Token
item.description:
While Monopoly GO features some classic tokens from the original game, like the Top Hat, it also brings in a ton of new and unique tokens. These new tokens draw inspiration from different themes or cultural events. Adding new tokens to their collection is a major motivator for many Monopoly GO players. The latest piece they can add to their shelves is the Scottie Awards token, inspired by Mr. Monopoly’s Scotty Dog. Read on to learn how to get the Scottie Awards token in Monopoly GO .

How to Get a Scottie Awards Token in Monopoly GO

The Scottie Awards token is a unique collectible, clearly designed with the glitz and excitement of Hollywood in mind. With its flashy orange collar and gold star right by its feet, the Scottie Awards token perfectly captures the essence of award ceremonies.

To get this one-of-a-kind token, you need to complete the new Movie Nights album in Monopoly GO . The Movie Nights album features 18 sets, comprising 162 stickers in total, all related to the exciting world of film.

As you complete each set, you’ll win a variety of rewards. For collecting all 162 stickers, you’ll be rewarded with the Scottie Awards token, 12,000 Dice Rolls, and a generous amount of cash.

The Movie Night album launched on March 06, 2025, and will run through May 01, 2025. This means players have enough time to complete the 18 sets and snag the Scottie Awards token.

How To Equip and Change Tokens in Monopoly GO

After you claim the Scottie Awards token, you can immediately equip it and watch it move around the board. The token will also be displayed on your Monopoly GO's Tycoon Card, for all other players to see.

Here’s a quick breakdown of how you can equip and change board tokens in Monopoly GO .

  1. Launch Monopoly GO on your device.
  2. Open the menu by tapping on the three bars in the top right corner of the screen.
  3. Next, tap on the “My Showroom” menu. Here, you’ll find all of your collectibles arranged neatly: dice skins, shields, tokens, and emojis.
  4. Click on the Tokens button to display all the tokens you currently have.
  5. Scroll through the available tokens until you find the one you want to use.
  6. Tap on the desired token to select it.
  7. After selecting the token, there should be an "Equip" button. Tap this button to confirm your choice and change your board token.
